title: Unified Code + General Intelligence Model
description: GPT-5 combines Codex + GPT-5 training stacks -- bringing together best-in-class code generation, reasoning, and general-purpose intelligence in one unified model. Apply this concept to OpenClaw by creating a unified skill manager that can handle both coding and general tasks seamlessly.
notes: Create a unified skill router that can intelligently route between coding skills and general skills based on task type. Sub-agent started implementation.
